ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has seen significant activity, including several pull requests focused on osu!taiko rhythm and stamina balancing, as well as the addition of basic difficulty and performance calculation for the Autopilot mod. Other updates include changes to the metronome speed and rebalancing of star ratings and performance points. These updates aim to improve gameplay and overall user experience.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu-wiki repository has experienced notable activity with multiple pull requests updating team listings for the MWC 7K 2025 tournament, as well as additions of new articles for tournaments such as ANZT. These updates contribute to maintaining a comprehensive and up-to-date wiki for the osu! community, enhancing knowledge sharing and accessibility.

ppy/osu-web.summary: The osu-web repository has seen activity with a pull request aimed at replacing ts-loader and terser with swc, potentially improving the efficiency and performance of the web application. This change reflects ongoing efforts to maintain and enhance the osu! web platform.
